programme.title: Christmas Casanova
programme.desc: A podcaster in need of catchy Christmas content offers to help Daniyal win over his love in exchange for the ability to record the process. As the two work together, it becomes clear that Daniyal might be trying to win over the wrong woman.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas Pairing
programme.desc: After a bad review from a food critic, renowned chef Grace Cooke returns home for Christmas and reconnects with her roots.

programme.title: A Vineyard Christmas
programme.desc: Heather is determined to create the perfect Christmas episode by featuring a unique winery from her hometown.

programme.title: The Christmas Venue
programme.desc: Losing faith in Christmas after a rough breakup, Cait heads home and meets Drew.

programme.title: A Christmas Wish in Hudson
programme.desc: A woman takes a shot at love after seeing a widowed firefighter and chef on a cooking show. With the help of his daughter, the two of them might find love this Christmas.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: A lover's quarrel between Erica and Ethan sends her back to camp.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Judith is less than impressed with Erica's inability to follow strict directions when she babysits Max for the first time.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica jumps on board a major career opportunity and jets back to a summer in Taipei.

programme.title: The Heiress of Christmas
programme.desc: Heiress to the famed department store Hamptons, Loryn is put to the test by her grandmother. Things don't run smoothly as Loryn works at the store during its busiest time of the year and tries to impress the handsome but cynical manager Aiden.

programme.title: Christmas Lovers Anonymous
programme.desc: A best-selling author hides her love for Christmas after an ugly break up, but finds love again when she joins a website for people who are crazy about Christmas.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Christmas
programme.desc: When a woman returns home to find her ex in a relationship, she enlists her best friend to act as her fake boyfriend.

programme.title: Royally Yours, This Christmas
programme.desc: A royal prince falls in love with a single mother and hotel housekeeper at Christmastime after he mistakes her for a wealthy hotel guest.
